property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Recover 1$$ (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay 1$$. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance `: When target creature other than Adarkar Valkyrie dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She doesn't escort the dead to the afterlife, but instead raises them to fight and die again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 2=: Tap target creature and put an ice counter on it. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Creatures with ice counters on them don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arcum is a babbling fool Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."—Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on Juniper Order Ranger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: =: Boreal Centaur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who used reindeer as beasts of burden knew to avoid the centaurs, who raged at the enslavement of their spirit-kin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample If another creature would die, exile it instead. Put a card exiled with Void Maw into its owner's graveyard: Void Maw gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. 1=, `: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 2 plus an additional 2 for each card named Rune Snag in each graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Concentration is key. Without it, a mage conjures nothing but a splitting headache."—Zur the Enchanter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let your heartbeat be the thunder in the valley. Let your swords be the lightning on the peaks."—Lothar Lovisason, Balduvian chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The few surviving humans of Krov would have welcomed the return of winter and its sterilizing cold. They often peered northward, hoping that the snow's edge had reached their infested city-tomb.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Feast of Flesh deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is 1 plus the number of cards named Feast of Flesh in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Starving an army that feeds on its enemies is a sound strategy."—Garza Zol, plague queen

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep = (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it. = can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) If a creature would deal combat damage to you and/or one or more creatures you control, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of age counters on Cover of Winter. =: Put an age counter on Cover of Winter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Jokulmorder enters the battlefield tapped. When Jokulmorder enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice five lands. Jokulmorder doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever you play an Island, you may untap Jokulmorder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Reveal X white cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Sands: You gain three times X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only in our vulnerability is there true power, and that power is life itself."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep 1 (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) `: Kjeldoran Javelineer deals damage equal to the number of age counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. =: Enchanted creature gains defender until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stalking Yeti enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature an opponent controls and that creature deals damage equal to its power to Stalking Yeti. 2=: Return Stalking Yeti to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield tapped. As Coldsteel Heart enters the battlefield, choose a color. `: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darien's call to Yavimaya would have fallen red to the snow had it not been for the agility of the aesthir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile two blue cards from your hand rather than pay Commandeer's mana cost. Gain control of target noncreature spell. You may choose new targets for it. (If that spell is an artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker, the permanent enters the battlefield under your control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. 2%: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "%: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search his or her library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep—Add % to your mana pool. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To a trained mind, the cold is but a momentary distraction."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nature? Fire? Bah Both are chaotic and difficult to control. Ice is structured, latticed, light as a feather, massive as a glacier. In ice, there is power"—Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Tresserhorn Skyknight by creatures with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kjeldorans who fled battle were exiled to the wastes. Those who strayed near Tresserhorn were pressed into service in Haakon's army.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a 1/1 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield. It has "This creature gets +1/+1 for each card named Sound the Call in each graveyard."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you call the wolves, ensure you have a worthy hunt, or you may become the hunted."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some creatures are bound to the cold by Rimewind magic. Others seek it out, adapted by two thousand years of the Ice. The Boreal, where Heidar's frigid sway is strongest, is home to both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying ==: Frost Raptor gains shroud until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent. A creature with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Rimewind wizards strove to perpetuate a magical winter. Their unnatural snows birthed unnatural beasts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may put that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With his dream of unification fulfilled, Darien became the last king of Kjeldor. Those who followed were known as the kings of New Argive."—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guard, fetch me a mallet."—Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal."—Zur the Enchanter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Vexing Sphinx dies, draw a card for each age counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Krovikan Mist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Illusions on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plague-induced dreams became real as they swirled above Krov, mingling with the magical residue of the World Spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Wilderness Elemental's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike Whenever Kjeldoran Gargoyle deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gargoyles were taken from the walls of flooded Kjeldoran cities and brought upland to guard the outposts of New Argive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: =: Thermopod gains haste until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.) Sacrifice a creature: Add % to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slicking the ice with its heated underside, the thermopod skates at great speed to overtake its prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.

You control enchanted creature. When Krovikan Whispers is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Haakon, Stromgald Scourge from your graveyard, but not from anywhere else. As long as Haakon is on the battlefield, you may play Knight cards from your graveyard. When Haakon dies, you lose 2 life.

property.value: Cumulative upkeep @ or # (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When Jötun Owl Keeper dies, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each age counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a land card: Simian Brawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's odd to see the apes rip down trees to arm themselves in defense of their forests."—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

property.value: Sacrifice Garza's Assassin: Destroy target nonblack creature. Recover—Pay half your life, rounded up. (When another creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay half your life, rounded up. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

At the beginning of your end step, Magmatic Core deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the number of age counters on it.

property.value: XX1: Destroy target artifact or creature with converted mana cost X.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are deep, deep places in this world that have long burned hot with little regard for the whitening of the earth's thin skin."—Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 1=: Snow creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That such delicate creatures could become so powerful in the embrace of winter is yet more proof that I am right."—Heidar, Rimewind master

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, Gristle Grinner gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There it was, clawing the ice as it chittered and clicked its teeth. We fled in horror before it unearthed its grisly meal."—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying =: Boreal Griffin gains first strike until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More than snow falls from the Boreal skies."—Arkin Egilsson, skycaptain

You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.) Surging Flame deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

Whenever you pay Hibernation's End's cumulative upkeep, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Hibernation's End and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.value: Frost Marsh enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add # or $ to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now caged in Winter's bitter chill,Our people cry, their voices shrill—Eternal cold breaks down their will."—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that black sources and red sources would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The White Shield is not the burnished metal you lash to your forearm but the conviction that burns in your chest."—Lucilde Fiksdotter,leader of the Order of the White Shield

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or land. Recover %% (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay %%. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Thaw met Terisiare, mountains shed their icy skins, crushing homes and hopes alike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Rimefeather Owl's power and toughness are each equal to the number of snow permanents on the battlefield. 1=: Put an ice counter on target permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Ronom Unicorn: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aberrant magic of the Rimewind drew the unicorns back from the northern wastes to do battle once again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that Goblin Furrier would deal to snow creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clambering up and over the powdery slope, the goblin chanced upon a small furry thing. There they regarded each other: the goblin and his new pair of earmuffs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the School of the Unseen fell, so many magical treasures lay abandoned that no amount of death could deter the stream of thieves and desperate scholars.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying =: Chilling Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rimewind necromancers caught travelers in mystical blizzards then trapped their spirits in the mist of their final frozen breaths.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same converted mana cost as the revealed card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Highland Weald enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add % or ^ to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our noble land, enslaved by Rime,Is it our fate to freeze through time?If this be true, oh wicked crime."—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2=: Target snow creature gains first strike until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a snowdrift shows you its eyes, it's already too late.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Storm deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 3 plus the number of charge counters on it. Discard a land card: Put two charge counters on Lightning Storm. You may choose a new target for it. Any player may activate this ability but only if Lightning Storm is on the stack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Cumulative upkeep—Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature an opponent controls. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The scouts claim the cold has malice, and a mind. I begin to believe them. Impassable drifts seem to appear before us at every turn."—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You pray to Freyalise, but she cannot hear your pleas. It is Tevesh Szat who will claim your soul."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: King Darien's breath crystallized and fell to the frozen battlefield, but its command carried true to all soldiers of New Argive.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I lead my horde to the northwest. I won't return until the ice wizards fall and their fiendish contraptions are crushed"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Weep not for me. I will rise with the spring's new growth."

property.value: Adarkar's blank wastes make the mind wander—and stray thoughts are quickly caught and devoured.

property.value: 1, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Make sure those wretches feed only upon the plagued. The blood of the healthy is reserved for me alone."—Garza Zol, plague queen

property.value: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

property.value: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This close to Rimewind Keep, no avalanche is nature's doing."—Ukoten, centaur chieftain

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

property.value: The ohran viper is not cold-blooded. Its veins course with the same antigelid venom used to kill its prey.

property.name: Rules

property.value: The sun-hot glow radiated from the druids, leaving scattered metal in steaming pools as it passed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ronom Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls a snow land. When you control no snow lands, sacrifice Ronom Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With the spread of Rimewind's sorcerous winter, snow dwellers reclaimed their places atop the food chain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step lightly and we might be able to use it as a bridge."—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep—Sacrifice a creature. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian minds that constructed it did not live past its awakening.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target Plains or Island. Cryoclasm deals 3 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of Terisiare had come to live on frozen fields as though on solid ground. Nothing reminded them of the difference more clearly than the rifts brought on by the Thaw.

property.value: You may exile two white cards from your hand rather than pay Sunscour's mana cost. Destroy all creatures.

You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. 2, `, Put a card exiled with Jester's Scepter into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.

property.value: Tresserhorn Sinks enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add $ or % to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our land oppressed by silent Cold,We weary wretches, young and old,Pray that Springtime loose his hold."—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The umber stain of the Thaw will be bleached away. Once again the world will be sharp, white, perfect"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, each player gains control of all nontoken permanents he or she owns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have been trapped in the lizard's lair for days. It seems to regard me as its child and will not let me leave."—Aevar Borg, northern guide, journal entry

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever a creature dealt damage by Garza Zol, Plague Queen this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol. Whenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile two green cards from your hand rather than pay Allosaurus Rider's mana cost. Allosaurus Rider's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 1=: Target creature loses flying until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Terisiare has only two kinds of weather: cold and weird.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a snow land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our border lands fall under the grip of Heidar's second winter. Go forth and reclaim them for Yavimaya."—Kaysa, elder druid of the Juniper Order

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Bull Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aurochs herd is content to graze—until the bull provides the dissenting urge to charge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep $ (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each age counter on Phyrexian Etchings. When Phyrexian Etchings is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose 2 life for each age counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Target creature can't block this turn. =: Goblin Rimerunner gains haste until end of turn. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rimerunners set off avalanches to immobilize foes as well as to create more challenging slopes.

property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. 4=, `, Sacrifice Mouth of Ronom: Mouth of Ronom deals 4 damage to target creature. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hope it's true that every snowflake is unique, because I never want to see one like this again. Now clean up that body."—Thangbrand Gyrdsson, Kjeldoran patrol

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and have first strike. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Knights of Stromgald struck Darien's Roost from two sides. They would have caught Kjeldor in a pincer attack were it not for Darien's tacticians.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Rimehorn Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs. 2=: Target creature blocks target creature this turn if able. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spells you cast have ripple 4. (Whenever you cast a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as the spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Aurochs Herd enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aurochs card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. Whenever Aurochs Herd attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Cumulative upkeep—Gain control of a land you don't control. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Herald of Leshrac gets +1/+1 for each land you control but don't own. When Herald of Leshrac leaves the battlefield, each player gains control of each land he or she owns that you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white $: Stromgald Crusader gains flying until end of turn. $$: Stromgald Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The White-Shielders think their code justifies their actions. In truth it only binds their hands."

property.value: Cumulative upkeep 2 (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Snow permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A realm once green now ruled by Frost,Where flesh and field both pay its cost.Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ."—The Dynasty of Winter Kings

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste Lightning Serpent enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Lightning Serpent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ice exploded into steam in its wake, hissing like a thousand serpents hailing their blazing master.

property.value: Counter target spell. Recover 2## (When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay 2##. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cumulative upkeep—Flip a coin. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever you win a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Whenever you lose a coin flip, Karplusan Minotaur deals 1 damage to target creature or player of an opponent's choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice a creature: Orcish Bloodpainter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, `: Counter target activated ability. Activate this ability only if you control four or more snow permanents. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Thaw brings flooding, disease, and death. We will do all in our power to bring frigid peace back to the world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: #, `: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 blue Elemental creature with flying. It's still a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether frozen or fertile, the land is our ally. It awaits the call to battle."

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Remove target blocking creature from combat. Creatures it was blocking that hadn't become blocked by another creature this combat become unblocked, then it blocks an attacking creature of your choice. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

property.value: Protection from black @: White Shield Crusader gains flying until end of turn. @@: White Shield Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.value: "Honor your steed and it will carry you to great deeds—and bring you home to tell of them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Karplusan Wolverine becomes blocked, you may have it deal 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not easily trained. Fortunately, they already know how to kill."—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Snow landwalk =: Regenerate Zombie Musher. (= can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen."—Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon

property.name: Rules

property.value: Its plow wasn't designed for snow, but to carve a path through shrieking armies.
